asciiName: The Ultimate Nightmare of Wizards of the Coast Customer Service
flavorText: The number printed on the card is no longer in service. For help, go to wizards.custhelp.com or find us on Twitter @Wizards_Help.
name: The Ultimate Nightmare of Wizards of the Coast® Customer Service
originalText: The Ultimate Nightmare of Wizards of the Coast® Customer Service deals X damage to each of Y target creatures and Z target players.

rulings.text: This card recieved errata for its flavor text on Gatherer: http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=9757

text: The Ultimate Nightmare of Wizards of the Coast® Customer Service deals X damage to each of Y target creatures and Z target players or planeswalkers.
